alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Chuska Mountains; East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Far Northeast Highlands; Far Northwest Highlands; Glorieta Mesa Including Glorieta Pass; Jemez Mountains; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; Northeast Highlands; Northwest Highlands; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area; Upper Rio Grande Valley; West Central Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 8:16PM MST until November 25 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 6 inches, with locally higher amounts in the Jemez Mountains. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, northeast, northwest, and west central New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 1 PM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you. This includes along portions of I-40.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
